bibl.title: Lesbian Armour: Alcaeus fr. 140 Voigt.
bibl.note: Discusses the structure of Alcaeus, fr. 140 Voigt (reproduced by Athenaeus, also partially preserved in two papyri) and the description of the arms stored in the storehouse of Odysseus' Palace on Ithaca in Od. 21 and 22. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Diskin Clay, Lesbian Armour: Alcaeus fr. 140 Voigt.

Discusses the structure of Alcaeus, fr. 140 Voigt (reproduced by Athenaeus, also partially preserved in two papyri) and the description of the arms stored in the storehouse of Odysseus' Palace on Ithaca in Od. 21 and 22. - Avec résumé en anglais.
